about_the_game:
Engaging and vivid real-time battle action with Cookies!


Utilize cookies with unique traits to battle enemy cookies, create strategies, and experience the different game modes!

[Game Modes]
Wanted Star (5v5): Within a limited time, defeat the enemy Cookies and collect Star Jellies!
Battle Royale: With Power Jellies, defeat the enemies to be the last one standing!
Conquest (5v5): Take control of designated areas and collect Points!

A Variety of Unique Cookies


Meet the 3D Cookies, each with their own individual characteristics, along with visuals that enhance their cuteness! Collect your favorite Cookies and customize them to your liking various skins and accessories.

Skills! The Key to Battles


Enjoy one of a kind battles with the diverse skills of the Cookies!
Some skills with special attributes can interact with objects in the battle field.

Create a Team with Your Friends


Play with your friends by forming a team to participate in various battles and modes together.
Teaming with friends allows you to strategize and obtain victory while increasing the fun!

Use the Landscape for Strategic Plays


In an ever-changing sweet battlefield, drop fruit trees or destroy bridges to impede the progress of the opposing team.
Use various terrain features such as jumping platforms of conveyor belts to gain the upper hand!

My Home: Decorate Your Own Place!


Collect various decorations and furniture as rewards to create your own personal space!
Show off your individual taste and style by inviting your friends over to your home.
detailed_description:
WISHLIST & FOLLOW!


About the Game

Engaging and vivid real-time battle action with Cookies!


Utilize cookies with unique traits to battle enemy cookies, create strategies, and experience the different game modes!

[Game Modes]
Wanted Star (5v5): Within a limited time, defeat the enemy Cookies and collect Star Jellies!
Battle Royale: With Power Jellies, defeat the enemies to be the last one standing!
Conquest (5v5): Take control of designated areas and collect Points!

A Variety of Unique Cookies


Meet the 3D Cookies, each with their own individual characteristics, along with visuals that enhance their cuteness! Collect your favorite Cookies and customize them to your liking various skins and accessories.

Skills! The Key to Battles


Enjoy one of a kind battles with the diverse skills of the Cookies!
Some skills with special attributes can interact with objects in the battle field.

Create a Team with Your Friends


Play with your friends by forming a team to participate in various battles and modes together.
Teaming with friends allows you to strategize and obtain victory while increasing the fun!

Use the Landscape for Strategic Plays


In an ever-changing sweet battlefield, drop fruit trees or destroy bridges to impede the progress of the opposing team.
Use various terrain features such as jumping platforms of conveyor belts to gain the upper hand!

My Home: Decorate Your Own Place!


Collect various decorations and furniture as rewards to create your own personal space!
Show off your individual taste and style by inviting your friends over to your home.

name: Cookie Run: OvenSmash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended

short_description: Cookie Run: OvenSmash is a real-time battle action game loaded with a variety of characteristically unique cookies. Enjoy the multitude of modes with your friends and showcase your skills with your favourite cookie!
supported_languages:
English*, Korean*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
